LanguageData.SALMessage_NoDataDiskFound: Please place a data disk nearby first.
LanguageData.SALDataStartEncoding_Desc: Import a new recipe from nearby work tables.
LanguageData.SAL3Alert_SomeBillsRemoved: Some bills have been deleted as the smart assembler cannot make them anymore.
LanguageData.SALToggleForbidden_Desc: Allow/Disallow the auto-assembler to take forbidden items. Tick means allow.
LanguageData.DeepQuarry_TotalSoFar: Total number of rocks mined so far: {0}
LanguageData.SmartHopper_Minimum_UseTooltip: When this is enabled, the smart hopper will unforbid its items if the stored item has less than X stack size. It will also only take items if there are enough items around to exceed the minimum.
LanguageData.SmartHopper_Maximum_UseTooltip: When this is enabled, the smart hopper will stop taking items if either the stack is full, or the stack size exceeds or is equal to X.
